name: .GANTT File Extension
summary: Learn about .GANTT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a GANTT file with Online Gantt (Web). To do so:
Open Online Gantt in your web browser.
Navigate to and open your GANTT file.

Because GANTT files are renamed .JSON files, you can technically also open them with Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or any other text editor. However, doing so isn't very helpful. Thus, you're best off opening a GANTT file with Online Gantt.
You can use Online Gantt to convert GANTT files to the following formats:
To do so, open your GANTT file with Online Gantt, and then click the Export button.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
